How it works
A brief description of how our service works
and how everything works

    You buy a voucher for fiat money using a convenient payment method

  • Redeem Voucher

    You enter the voucher number and the email of the person who sent it

  • You get USDT

    to your specified wallet

FAQ
Here you can find answers to the most frequently asked questions about our service.
Apakah aplikasi ini sudah dapat izin dari MUI?

Ya gratis dong, masa aplikasi chat aja berbayar sih. Lo kalo nanya yang bener dong. Bayangin aja kalo aplikasi ini berbayar, masa pas chat lo harus bayar setiap karakter. Kalo lo mau bayar mending pake MMS aja dah.
